## ThirdwebSDK.getDropContract() method

Get an instance of a Drop contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDropContract(contractAddress: string): DropErc721Contract;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  contractAddress | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>

DropErc721Contract

the contract
